messages.message:
Hi, when we create an application on the platfrom, does that application always stay with the same config and setup from that point?

For example what happens on this scenario?

• Create ‘version 1’ of the app. The app includes table extraction.
• We then update the platform to handle table extraction better.
• User doesn’t update their app.
What happens to the prompts in their app, would be handle the prompts in the same way as when the app was compiled, or would the app autoamtically benefit from improments to the way we handle prompts?

automatically benefit / model changes will be automatically applied as the platform evolves.

as the llm world moves very fast right now and how frequent we update AI hub, purely on the software side we can't really versioned every model related change in the code base -- it will be very hard to manage. we also use third party models (open AI) and can't guarantee nothing changes there too, so just locking our code here doesn't eliminate any potential "changes" people see in their app output.
